static.description: an id token policy example that uses differnet types of conditions
static.statement: permit ( principal in NAMESPACE::Role::"System Administrator", action in [NAMESPACE::Action::"View"], resource) when { principal has app_id && principal.app_id == "AVPCyberArk" && principal has name && principal.name like "Prata*" && principal.session_time_long > 100000 && principal.session_config_json.session_idle > 20 };
